snippet: The Directors Guild of America announces its feature nominees and David Fincher's inclusion proves a surprise.
abstract: The Directors Guild of America announces its feature nominees and David Fincher's inclusion proves a surprise.
lead_paragraph: Looks like David Fincher may have to rethink his definition of an awards movie. As far as he was concerned, "The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo" didn't qualify. "There's too much anal rape in this movie" for it to be a prize contender, he recently told Entertainment Weekly.
